Package utility.field.friendly

Class Allied

java.lang.Object
utility.field.FieldObject
utility.field.GameUnit
utility.field.friendly.Allied
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefenseUnit, HomeBase, Mech, MobileUnit
public abstract class Allied
extends GameUnit
class representing an Ally. - this is to ensure no Ally can damage another ally. - class is made abstract to avoid any Ally classes made.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Allied​(float x, float y, float health, float width, float height)
    Creates a class representing a Allied Unit, will be used to mark targets attackable or not based on whether they are an ally or a enemy.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class utility.field.GameUnit

    draw, getCurrentHealth, getHeight, getMaxHealth, getWidth, inflictDamage, setCurrentHealth, setHeight, setWidth, showHealthBar

    Methods inherited from class utility.field.FieldObject

    changePos, getBoundary, getPosition, getX, getY, setXPosition, setYPosition

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Allied

      public Allied​(float x, float y, float health, float width, float height)
      Creates a class representing a Allied Unit, will be used to mark targets attackable or not based on whether they are an ally or a enemy.
      Parameters:
      x - map center x coordinate.
      y - map center y coordinate.
      health - initialized health
      width - width of bounding rect.
      height - height of bounding rect.
